Name: ai
Purpose: Register the parent command for AI provider and model configuration.

Name: ratelimit
Purpose: Configure AI rate limits per guild.

Name: set-model
Purpose: Allow selecting an AI model per guild based on the configured provider.

Name: set-provider
Purpose: Allow selecting an AI provider per guild using autocomplete.

Name: achievements
Purpose: Display achievement board and manage achievements.

Name: balance
Purpose: Display user balance with improved UX.

Name: bank
Purpose: Display bank breakdown with safety rating.

Name: coinflip
Purpose: Bet on a coin flip with heads or tails.

Name: craft
Purpose: List available recipes and craft items.

Name: daily
Purpose: User claims a configurable amount of primary currency once per 24h (guild).

Name: economy-freeze
Purpose: Freeze a user's economy account for a specified duration.

Name: economy-health
Purpose: Show sector balances, daily/work config, and recent audit activity.

Name: economy-peek
Purpose: View a user's economy data for moderation review.

Name: economy-report
Purpose: Generate economy telemetry reports with insights and recommendations.

Name: economy-rollback
Purpose: Roll back audited operations by correlationId (admin only).

Name: economy-sectors
Purpose: Show sector balances (global, works, trade, tax) and last updated.

Name: economy-unfreeze
Purpose: Unfreeze a user's economy account.

Name: equip
Purpose: Show equipable items and let users equip them.

Name: event-launch-week
Purpose: Quick-start the Launch Week event with preset modifiers.

Name: event
Purpose: View, start, and stop guild events with modifiers.

Name: give-currency
Purpose: Mod-only currency adjustment with audit logging.

Name: loadout
Purpose: Show user's equipped items with stats summary.

Name: ops
Purpose: Configure launch operations - channel, reports, soft launch mode.

Name: perks
Purpose: List and purchase perks for the current guild.

Name: profile
Purpose: Display comprehensive economy profile.

Name: progress
Purpose: Display XP + level progression for the current guild.

Name: quest
Purpose: View quest details, check progress, and claim rewards.

Name: quests
Purpose: Display the quest board with daily, weekly, and featured quests.

Name: rob
Purpose: Attempt to steal currency from another user.

Name: shared
Purpose: Common helpers for economy commands.

Name: store
Purpose: Buy and sell items at the guild store with featured item rotation.

Name: title
Purpose: Manage equipped titles and display badges.

Name: transfer
Purpose: User-to-user currency transfer with tax and large transfer alerts.

Name: trivia-admin
Purpose: Admin tools for managing trivia questions - stats and list.

Name: trivia
Purpose: Answer trivia questions with button-based answers, streaks, and explanations.

Name: unequip
Purpose: Show equipped slots with buttons to unequip.

Name: vote-config
Purpose: Configure voting preferences and opt-out.

Name: vote-leaderboard
Purpose: Show top users by love/hate/net votes.

Name: vote
Purpose: Cast love/hate votes on other users.

Name: work
Purpose: User claims a repeatable work payout with cooldown + daily cap.

Name: economy-audit
Purpose: Query recent audit entries with filters (mod/admin).

Name: recent
Purpose: Query recent audit entries with filters; output paginated, compact.

Name: economy-config
Purpose: Expose guild economy configuration (view) and admin-only updates (set).

Name: set-daily-fee-rate
Purpose: Admin command to set the daily claim fee rate (0..0.20).

Name: set-daily-fee-sector
Purpose: Admin command to set the sector for daily claim fee deposit.

Name: set-daily-streak-bonus
Purpose: Admin command to set the per-day streak bonus amount.

Name: set-daily-streak-cap
Purpose: Admin command to set the maximum streak bonus cap.

Name: feature
Purpose: Admin-only toggle for economy feature flags (kill switches).

Name: store
Purpose: Admin-only configuration for store rotation, featured items, and pricing modifiers.

Name: tax-rate
Purpose: Admin-only set guild tax rate (0..0.5).

Name: tax-sector
Purpose: Admin-only set which sector receives tax deposits (global|works|trade|tax).

Name: thresholds
Purpose: Admin-only set transfer alert thresholds (warning, alert, critical).

Name: trivia
Purpose: Admin-only configuration for trivia settings including difficulty multipliers,

Name: set-work-base-mint
Purpose: Admin command to set minted base reward (always paid) for /work.

Name: set-work-bonus-max
Purpose: Admin command to set max bonus funded by treasury for /work.

Name: set-work-bonus-mode
Purpose: Admin command to set bonus scale mode (flat | percent) for /work.

Name: set-work-cooldown-minutes
Purpose: Admin command to set cooldown for /work.

Name: set-work-currency-id
Purpose: Admin command to set currency for /work payouts.

Name: set-work-daily-cap
Purpose: Admin command to set daily cap for /work.

Name: set-work-failure-chance
Purpose: Admin command to set failure chance for /work payouts.

Name: set-work-pays-from-sector
Purpose: Admin command to set which guild sector funds /work payouts.

Name: set-work-reward-base
Purpose: Admin command to set base payout for /work.

Name: set-xp
Purpose: Admin command to configure XP amounts and cooldowns per source.

Name: view
Purpose: Show guild tax rate, deposit sector, thresholds, store config, capacity defaults (if any).

Name: store-admin
Purpose: Manage guild store items (add, edit, remove).

Name: joke
Purpose: Generate a joke using AI.

Name: give-item
Purpose: Mod-only item granting with capacity constraints.

Name: inventory
Purpose: Display user inventory with pagination, filtering, and inspection.

Name: remove-item
Purpose: Mod-only item removal.

Name: ban
Purpose: Register the "moderation/ban" command to offer the action consistently.

Name: kick
Purpose: Register the "moderation/kick" command to offer the action consistently.

Name: mute
Purpose: Register the "moderation/mute" command to offer the action consistently.

Name: restrict
Purpose: Register the "moderation/restrict" command to offer the action consistently.

Name: delete
Purpose: Delete an auto-role rule with optional active assignment purging.

Name: help
Purpose: Provide contextual help for admins tweaking autorole rules.

Name: autorole
Purpose: Manage auto-role rules for the server.

Name: add
Purpose: Register an auxiliary channel defined by the staff.

Name: list
Purpose: List current core and optional channels.

Name: channels
Purpose: Manage bot-related channels.

Name: remove
Purpose: Remove a previously registered optional channel.

Name: set
Purpose: Update one of the required core channels.

Name: add
Purpose: Add monitored forums for AI-powered automatic replies.

Name: list
Purpose: List monitored forums for AI-powered automatic replies.

Name: forums
Purpose: Configure AI-monitored forums.

Name: remove
Purpose: Remove a monitored forum for AI-powered automatic replies.

Name: rep
Purpose: Manage user reputation.

Name: shared
Purpose: Shared helpers for reputation commands.

Name: clear-limit
Purpose: Remove a usage limit from a managed role.

Name: control
Purpose: Configure moderation overrides for managed roles.

Name: dashboard
Purpose: Visual dashboard for managing moderated roles.

Name: list
Purpose: List managed roles and their limits.

Name: roles
Purpose: Manage bot-administered roles.

Name: remove
Purpose: Remove a managed role configuration.

Name: set-limit
Purpose: Configure usage limits (rate limits) for moderation actions on managed roles.

Name: set
Purpose: Register or update a managed role configuration.

Name: shared
Purpose: Shared helpers and common logic for moderation role management.

Name: close-all
Purpose: Forcefully close and delete all active ticket channels in the guild.

Name: config
Purpose: Setup the ticket system channels and category.

Name: tickets
Purpose: Configure and manage the tickets system.

Name: config
Purpose: Enable and adjust the TOPs system per server.

Name: add
Purpose: Add a warning to a user.

Name: clear
Purpose: Clear all warnings for a user.

Name: list
Purpose: List all warnings for a user.

Name: warn
Purpose: Register the parent command for user warnings.

Name: remove
Purpose: Remove a specific warning from a user.

Name: create
Purpose: Create a new job offer and send it for review.

Name: edit
Purpose: Edit an active job offer using the embed designer.

Name: offer
Purpose: Register the parent command for job offer management.

Name: withdraw
Purpose: Withdraw an active job offer from review.

Name: cutdown
Purpose: Gather wood from forests using equipped axe.

Name: equip
Purpose: Equip items from inventory to RPG equipment slots.

Name: fight
Purpose: Challenge players to combat, accept fights, and submit moves.

Name: rpg-loadout
Purpose: View your current equipment and loadout with stat totals.

Name: mine
Purpose: Gather ores from mining locations using equipped pickaxe.

Name: rpg
Purpose: Parent command for RPG system - profile, equipment, gathering.

Name: process
Purpose: Process raw materials into refined materials.

Name: profile
Purpose: Display RPG profile with loadout, stats, combat record, and HP.

Name: unequip
Purpose: Remove equipped items and return them to inventory.

Name: upgrade-tool
Purpose: Upgrade a tool to the next tier with materials and money.

Name: suggest
Purpose: Allow users to submit suggestions for the server.
